jobDescription: Apply Now  Digital Analytics: Senior Data Analyst  Req #: 180012132_2  Location: San Francisco, CA,US  Job Category: Marketing/Communications Job Description: Description  Chase is undertaking an aggressive digital transformation agenda, which builds on the success of the current mobile and online service offerings. Chase is investing in innovative ways to deepen customer engagement and profitability through the use of digital channels. The ambition is to position Chase as the undisputed leader in digital financial services and payments and to enable Chase to deliver the highly personalized, real time experiences that customers increasingly expect.  Chase Digital is searching for a Data Analyst who will be a key member of the Digital Analytics organization.
